content: As we embark upon 2023, we will continue to optimize our operational efficiency and cost control measures, enhancing our agility and ability to compete amid the new regulatory environment. And looking at the sales outlook for the year, if these illegal products could be mitigated on the market, what we can share on this stage is that the stores, which only sell GB products, for example, like our direct own stores, we could see that in recent months, their sales per store has been gradually improving.
